page.title: 05LEISURE IN ASCOT
page.content: The most popular pastime for adult men in our area is golf.There is a golf club in the middle of Ascot Race course. The most popular pastimes for adult women are gardening and cooking.Many of the women interviewed had chosen to stay at home rather than go out to work. Although many children enjoy reading most of their hobbies are connected with sport or dancing classes at various centres in the area. Most adults and children in the area include sport such as squash, athletics,tennis,swimming and skating and dancing classes such as ballet and aerobics in their favourite hobbies or pastimes.
